# BetterOVH

> A modern frontend for OVH Cloud infrastructure management

BetterOVH is a React 19 application built with TanStack Start that provides a better interface for managing OVH Cloud resources.

## Tech Stack

- Framework: TanStack Start with React 19
- Routing: TanStack Router (file-based)
- State: TanStack Query + Zustand
- UI: Base UI + Tailwind CSS v4
- Icons: Hugeicons
- Testing: Vitest + Testing Library
- Package Manager: Bun

## Features

- Instance Management (create, start, stop, reboot, delete)
- Volume Storage (create, attach, detach, delete)
- Private Networks configuration
- SSH Keys management
- Dashboard with stats and activity
- Dark/Light mode
- Notifications with auto-dismiss
- Full keyboard navigation

## Project Structure

- `/apps/web/src/components/` - UI components
- `/apps/web/src/routes/` - File-based routes
- `/apps/web/src/lib/` - Utilities, queries, stores
- `/apps/web/src/hooks/` - Custom React hooks
- `/packages/ovh/` - OVH API client
- `/packages/ui/` - Shared UI components

## Key Components

- `InstancesTable` - Display and manage cloud instances
- `VolumesTable` - Display and manage storage volumes
- `NetworksTable` - Display private networks
- `SSHKeysTable` - Display and manage SSH keys
- `StatsCards` - Dashboard statistics
- `NotificationCenter` - Toast notifications
- `ErrorState` - Reusable error display
- `EmptyState` - Reusable empty state display

## API Patterns

All API queries use TanStack Query with:
- Automatic caching and revalidation
- Optimistic updates for mutations
- Error handling with ErrorState component

## Component Patterns

Components follow consistent patterns:
- TypeScript interfaces for props
- Loading states with Skeleton components
- Error states with ErrorState component
- Empty states with EmptyState component
- Keyboard navigation support
